page.title: 18GOLF COURSE
page.content: There is a golf course on the edge of our area.Golf is a popular game _ the idea being to hit a ball into a small hole.To hit the ball the golfers use a club _ there are lots of diffrent types of clubs.The golfers carry their clubs in a bag _ sometimes they pay somebody else to carry the bag,he is as a caddy.At the golf course there is a club house _ in here the golfers can get a meal or a drink. The club house at Holyhead has a dormy house as well _ this is where visiting golfers can stay at overnight if they want to.
